attributes.action: Post the completion of several skyscrapers after 2012, demolish Tower 42 as it will no longer be a necessary facet to our capitals skyline.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: , after the completion of several skyscrapers after 2012, demolish Tower 42 as it will no longer be a necessary facet to our capitals skyline, allowing a more clear view to exist from St Paul's Cathedral.

reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
